stories.title: The Magic Forest Adventure
stories.description: Join Emma as she discovers a hidden world of talking animals and magical creatures in an enchanted forest.
stories.author: Sarah Johnson

chapters.title: The Hidden Path
chapters.content: Emma was walking through the woods behind her grandmother's house when she noticed something strange. A shimmering path made of golden leaves appeared before her, leading deeper into the forest than she had ever gone before.

choices.consequence: Emma misses the adventure but stays safe

chapters.title: The Talking Rabbit
chapters.content: As Emma followed the golden path, a small white rabbit hopped out from behind a tree. 'Welcome to the Magic Forest!' said the rabbit with a friendly smile. 'I'm Whiskers, and I've been waiting for someone brave like you.'

stories.title: The Little Dragon's Big Heart
stories.description: A small dragon learns that being different makes you special in this heartwarming tale about friendship and acceptance.
stories.author: Michael Chen

chapters.title: The Different Dragon
chapters.content: In a land where all dragons were big and fierce, there lived a little dragon named Spark who was different. While other dragons breathed fire, Spark could only make pretty colored smoke rings.

choices.consequence: Spark gets tired but doesn't give up

stories.title: The Mystery of the Missing Crown
stories.description: Detective Lucy must solve the case of the missing royal crown before the kingdom's biggest celebration.
stories.author: Detective Stories Inc.

chapters.title: The Crime Scene
chapters.content: Detective Lucy arrived at the royal palace to find chaos. The beautiful golden crown with sparkling jewels was nowhere to be found, and the coronation ceremony was only hours away!

choices.consequence: Discover important clues about the theft

stories.title: Cinderella's New Beginning
stories.description: The classic tale of Cinderella retold with modern twists and interactive choices that change the story.
stories.author: Classic Tales Reimagined

chapters.title: The Invitation
chapters.content: Cinderella received an invitation to the royal ball, but her stepmother had other plans. 'You must clean the entire house before you can even think about going,' she said with a mean smile.

choices.text: Ask the fairy godmother for help
Rally the mice friends to help

stories.title: The Space Explorer's Journey
stories.description: Captain Alex embarks on an incredible journey through the galaxy, meeting alien friends and discovering new worlds.
stories.author: Sci-Fi Adventures

chapters.title: Launch Day
chapters.content: Captain Alex stood in front of the shiny spaceship, ready for the biggest adventure of their life. The mission: explore three unknown planets and make contact with any friendly aliens they might find.

choices.text: Head to the colorful planet first
